title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When I double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it and answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog, the file is reopened quickly. However, if I repeat steps 1 and 2, and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
EB: When I select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, the contents of the window should be replaced with the original immediately, without any significant delay.
SR:
1. Open the file in the java editor.
2. Make some changes to the file.
3. Save the file.
4. Close the file.
5. Reopen the file by double-clicking on it in the navigator.
6. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog.
7. Repeat steps 5 and 6.
8. Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.
9. Observe if there is a delay of 15 seconds before the contents of the window are replaced with the original.
